title: 100% Pure Cosmetics - Organic Coffee Bean Eye Cream, 1 fl oz cream

title: theBalm - Hot Mama! Shadow/Blush 7.08g /POIDS NET WT. 0.25 OZ
description: Hot Mama provides subtle color for the eyes and cheeks in a warm rosy tone. This convenient flip-up compact puts beauty at your finger tips, while the magnetic case keeps the makeup clean and safe in your purse or pocket. This dynamic color blends well with most skin tones for a naturally sunny appearance.

Airless Bottle Price $23.50 We only have a limited quantitiy of these available, so when the are gone, their gone Nourish and protect your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays The suns damaging rays can cause photoaging. Tropical Sands is an all natural sunscreen is infused with green tea and Vitamin E 6 Titanium Dioxide Micronized T Lite 22.5 Zinc Oxide Micronized Z Cote OTHER INGREDIENTS Deionized Water, Sunflower Oil, Lecithin Soy based , Coconut Oil, Glycerine, Xanthan Gum, Green Tea Extract, Jojoba Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate Vitamin E , Shea Butter, Eucalyptus Oil.Please note that it is best to use a small amount and not apply it to heavily.
